Properties.ProtectedString:
local ball = script.Parent local fire = script.Parent local fireCount local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local fireSound = Instance.new("Sound") fireSound.Name = "fireSound" fireSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=32791565" fireSound.Parent = ball fireSound.Volume = 1
function onTouched(hit) if hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil then return end local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil then if ball.creator.Value.Name == humanoid.Parent.Name then return end if hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("BurnScript") == nil then fireSound:Play() end if hit:FindFirstChild("Fire") == nil then burn = script.BurnScript:clone() burn.Parent = hit.Parent burn.Disabled = false local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Color = Color3.new(205/255, 50/255, 120/255) fire.Parent = hit debris:AddItem(fire, 9) end elseif hit.CanCollide then ball.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) end end
ball.Touched:connect(onTouched)
wait(1.1) if ball then ball:Remove() end
for i = 1, 9 do script.Parent.Humanoid:TakeDamage(4) wait(1) end script:remove()

local Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function updateDir(mouse) if mouse then Tool.FlamethrowerScript.Dir.Value = mouse.Hit.lookVector end end
function onButton1Down(mouse) if not stillEquipped then return end enabled = false while Tool.Enabled do updateDir(mouse) wait(.01) end print("Setting Mouse To Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled do updateDir(mouse) wait(.01) end print("Setting Mouse to Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
enabled = true end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

-- Strange issue when I try to do the entire logic in a single script -- Must look into this more local Tool = script.Parent local vCharacter local myHumanoid local myTorso local vPlayer
Tool.Enabled = true
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Color = Color3.new(205/255, 50/255, 120/255) fire.Size = 8
local reload = 4
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local burnSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("burnSound") if burnSound == nil then burnSound = Instance.new("Sound") burnSound.Name = "burnSound" burnSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=31758982" burnSound.Parent = Tool.Handle burnSound.Volume = 0 end
local fireSound = Instance.new("Sound") fireSound.Name = "fireSound" fireSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=32791565" fireSound.Parent = ball fireSound.Volume = 1
function spread(direction) spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then return end local missile = Instance.new("Part")
fire:Clone().Parent = missile
spawnPos = spawnPos + (direction * 2)
missile.Position = spawnPos missile.Size = Vector3.new(3.5, 3.5, 3.5) missile.Velocity = direction * 20 missile.Name = "Flame" missile.Transparency = 1 missile.CanCollide = false
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.force = Vector3.new(0, missile:GetMass()* 200, 0) force.Parent = missile
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = missile
local new_script = script.Parent.FlameSpreadScript:Clone() new_script.Disabled = false new_script.Parent = missile
missile.Parent = game.Workspace end
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil or myTorso == nil then return end
local pauseTime = .10 local tempVect = Workspace.CurrentCamera.CoordinateFrame:pointToObjectSpace(myHumanoid.TargetPoint) local oldTargetDepth = tempVect.Z
Workspace.CurrentCamera.CoordinateFrame:pointToObjectSpace(myHumanoid.TargetPoint)
burnSound.Volume = 1 burnSound:Play() for i = 1, 20 do local direction = (myHumanoid.TargetPoint - myTorso.Position).unit if (script.Dir.Value.magnitude > .9 and script.Dir.Value.magnitude < 1.1) then direction = script.Dir.Value end spread(direction) wait(pauseTime) burnSound:Play() end wait(1) if burnSound then burnSound:Stop() end wait(reload) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() if burnSound then burnSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
